title: Charged Blaster Cannon
summaries: The Charged Blaster Cannon is a Hardmode, post-Golem magic weapon that fires electric spheres and beams. In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it has a 0.13*1/800 (0.13%) chance to drop from all basic enemies in the Martian Madness event. In the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance to be dropped by the Martian Saucer during the Martian Madness event.
The Charged Blaster Cannon has multiple firing modes:

• A single tap of the ⚒ Use / Attack button fires a small non-piercing orb.
  • Holding ⚒ Use / Attack rapid-fires the small orbs at a rate of 6 orbs per second. Mana is only consumed on the first orb that is fired.
  • After holding ⚒ Use / Attack for one second (i.e., after 6 small orbs have been fired), a larger orb with infinite piercing and 2.5× the damage (250 base damage) will be fired.
  • Continuing to hold ⚒ Use / Attack fires the larger orbs at a rate of 2 orbs per second. Mana is only consumed on the first large orb that is fired.
  • Holding ⚒ Use / Attack for two more seconds (i.e., after 3 large orbs have been fired) and continuing to hold it fires a large, solid beam. It deals 1.5× the damage (150 base damage) and hits all enemies in its path repeatedly, every 20 ticks, i.e. 3 times per second. Mana is consumed at the same rate, i.e. 42 base mana per second. On [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, the firing angle cannot be adjusted while the continuous beam is firing.
The attack is terminated when mana is depleted, the ⚒ Use / Attack button is released, or 5 seconds of firing the beam have passed.
